label: 芸子
本: Yoshiwara: The Glittering World of the Japanese Courtesan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1993
説明文: Odoriko who were too old to be called by that name and yet too young to be geisha were sometimes called geiko. Geiko could be illegal prostitutes or innocent. Later the term was a synonym for geisha. [踊子、芸者]
